tldr: Guest: Kobie Fuller (Upfront Ventures) on speed, conviction, and pattern-building.
Frameworks: funnel instrumentation; founder-market fit at sprint pace.
Contrarian: Speed is a moat when paired with debrief discipline.
learn: Balancing speed with signal quality in sourcing.
takeaways: Hiring: athletes of execution who can systematize learning.

faq.a: Kobie Fuller, General Partner at Upfront Ventures.
Blends high-speed execution with structured pattern recognition.
Codify sourcing funnels; define conviction tests; build post-investment playbooks.
